div.data-react-data-bundle: {"notifications":[{"id":7996,"message":"4\/21\/2020, 3:35pm - Dr. McClain has made the difficult decision to cancel in-person learning for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. This closure includes all in-person activities and events that would have taken place through June 30. Please refer to his full update by clicking on the \u201cCOVID-19\u201d update banner on the district or school home pages or by copying\/pasting https:\/\/www.pvre7.org\/coronavirus-communications-links-57b4c20f# in your browser window.","type":"banner"}]}

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
